value.0: I am the Sage of Ascension, what can I do for you?
I have not seen that note in a very long time....
It is mine, I wrote that note a long time ago when i was still young and foolish. I threw it away in the pits beyond glomy woods in the hope that noone would ever find it and realise what i had done.

When i was a young wizard my curiosity made me enter an ancient tomb. I though that i could defeat anything the world could throw at me so I ignored the warnings on the door to the tomb. By entering that tomb i unleashed a great evil upon this world.

Sealed in the tomb. Manny brave men gave their life to help me seal the evil in a sarcophagus. I was not strong enugh to defeat it and as i grow older my powers get weaker. I am afraid that one day i can no longer keep the evil from escaping....... Now you know what i have done and the shame that i must live with.

The tomb is located in the kobold glade. You will need a key to get inside, I can give you the key. Once inside you will find that only a mage can cross the bridge. You will need help if you hope to defeat the evil that is trapped in the sarcophagus.
Let me look through your pack.
My goodness, you arent very bright are you?  You can use a bottle to hold liquids, such as oil or water.  I suppose if you found magical water, this bottle might hold some of it for later use.
Interesting. I would recomend taking that to the hag in the forgotten forest... she collects them.
Interesting. I would recomend taking that to the hag in the forgotten forest... she collects them.
Interesting. I would recomend taking that to the hag in the forgotten forest... she collects them.
Interesting. I would recomend taking that to the hag in the forgotten forest... she collects them.

Well then he most certainly told you where you can use it as well!  Go to the cemetery here in town, and place the stone on a gravestone you will find there.  Take note of where it takes you, for you can use the stone to return to town as well.

I can feel the evil emanating from this crest. You will need this if you intend to enter the Queens Palace in Manatakloss.  My studies indicate that the Queen uses these crests to insure that only Drow may enter.

I can feel the evil emanating from this crest. You will need this if you intend to enter the Queens Palace in Manatakloss.  My studies indicate that the Queen uses these crests to insure that only Drow may enter.

I can feel the evil emanating from this crest. You will need this if you intend to enter the Queens Palace in Manatakloss.  My studies indicate that the Queen uses these crests to insure that only Drow may enter.

I can feel the evil emanating from this crest. You will need this if you intend to enter the Queens Palace in Manatakloss.  My studies indicate that the Queen uses these crests to insure that only Drow may enter.
Only 2 races in these parts are known to make human sacrifices, the Yuan'ti, and the Drow.  If you had a shovel, you might bury this poor soul in the town cemetery.

Very interesting, and quite valuable!  Take this to the statue in the tavern, it can transport you directly to Manatakloss. Take note of where you arrive, for these teeth can be used to return to town as well.

Ah, a most interesting find.  Commonly used for a dexterity boost, few know the background of these Eyes.  The Kranshar lords can regenerate their eyes very quickly, and over the millenia, they have devised a way to use them as a key to the Nobles treasure hoard, usualy quite well hidden. Since the eyes regenerate quickly after use, the Noble doesnt miss them for long. Hold on to this eye, in case you should run across the entrance to the Nobles treasure hoard.
The wizard north of town is doing research on beetles, Im sure he would be very interested in this mutant.
Hmm..  not really, but im sure they will fetch a fair price in any shop.

Unfortunately, no, unless you can somehow make them fertile again.  As they are now, they are nothing more than a museum piece.   I did hear once of a strange dwarf who could turn stone to flesh... I don't think he's been heard from since he entered the underdark however.
Indeed, these stones can be used at the fountain in front of the tavern to transport you to Anduins ruins. Take note of where you arrive, for the stones can be used to return to town.
This seal breaker looks to be of Yuan'ti origins, by its markings.  If you find any lizard men, Im sure the Yuan'ti are near.

Hmmm.. an obscure find you have there. These gems can normaly be used to communicate telepathicaly, howver this one seems tuned to the realms of the dead.  If you come across a ghost who cannot speak to you, you might try using this gem.

A powerfull artifact indeed!  This can be used in the ruins of Anduin to enter Anduins Temple.  Anduin used this staff as a key of sorts in several places, and no one may pass those locations without the staff.
Hmmm..  this broken staff still resonates with power. I think it will still open some of Andiuns secret escape routes. Hold on to it, for you may need it.

You might come across a few of those in your travels. They can be used to teleport to Ascension from anywhere.  Once you use it, stand very still for a moment while the gem pours enough magical energy into you for the teleport. If you were to try to use this gem in battle it would most likely fail.
These are difficult to come by... when activated, it will grant you total immunity to any fire for a short time.

OH MY!!  That is a rare find indeed, I have only heard of 2 in all my studies, supposedly near each other, buried deep in the underrealms...  I dont know if it is true or not, but I have heard rumors that the shaft of light here in Ascension, at the temple, is actualy a portal to a Gods dimension, and that these gems can activate that portal.   Be carefull of what you find if you go there, for I am quite sure the gods are not kind to thieves....
I am impressed that you have these...  You must plant them in magical soil to gain access to the Fey Kingdom.

Ahh yes.. this oil is very old... Im sure at one time it was a powerfull blessed oil used by the priests of Anduins temple. Although the blessing has allowed it to last all of these years, I am afraid its not usefull for anything more than oiling machinery now.

Indeed, and this is an important find. If you somehow manage to find all 5 of the parts, hidden in or near the forgotten forest,  take them to hazel, just outside the Dread Caverns, in the forgotten forest. She will know what to do with them.

Indeed, and this is an important find. If you somehow manage to find all 5 of the parts, hidden in or near the forgotten forest,  take them to hazel, just outside the Dread Caverns, in the forgotten forest. She will know what to do with them.

Indeed, and this is an important find. If you somehow manage to find all 5 of the parts, hidden in or near the forgotten forest,  take them to hazel, just outside the Dread Caverns, in the forgotten forest. She will know what to do with them.

Indeed, and this is an important find. If you somehow manage to find all 5 of the parts, hidden in or near the forgotten forest,  take them to hazel, just outside the Dread Caverns, in the forgotten forest. She will know what to do with them.

Indeed, and this is an important find. If you somehow manage to find all 5 of the parts, hidden in or near the forgotten forest,  take them to hazel, just outside the Dread Caverns, in the forgotten forest. She will know what to do with them.

You arent the sharpest needle in the sewing kit, are you?  Its for digging holes of course. Im sure farmer Bob left it laying around somewhere, he uses it in his garden and for burials in the cemetery.
*Sigh*  Its just like any other rope, you dolt!  Hmm..  the town well could use a new rope...
It can be used at the altar in the temple in town to enter Anduins old temple.  it can also be used to return to town.
Well, I study ancient texts and manuscripts mainly....  was there some question you had for me?
I know very little, but I can tell you that the Crown will make anyone who wears it nearly immortal.

Well, I would recomend staying west of town untill you are more experienced... I have an old friend that lives north of town that may need your assistance when you are ready to make the journey. Oh, I did hear something about a rat infestation in the cellar behind the tavern, you might check into it.

Oh MY!  This tome is very rare indeed... and will be valuable to your search.  It tells the story of the Crown, and I dare say it will provide new revelations. I have not read it myself, and such a task is very difficult, since it is written in Warriors Chant... a language dead for thousands of years. I will translate it for 100,000 gp, nothing less.

Very well then, here is your translation. By the way... I am certain you found this in the underdark.  If you are exploring the underbelly of the world, beware of Archemlis. He is know to assasinate adventurers and bring their heads to the Drow queen.  If you meet Archemlis, pray that Galadriem the Righteous, his arch-enemy, is near.  Galadriem has spent his life hunting down Archemlis, and helping others. If you see him, know that you are safe.

There is an ancient myth concerning the departure of the Fey races from our lands...  supposedly they felt the other races did not deserve the benefits the Fey could grant, and so they created a magical land and retreated to it.  It is said that they left behind Faery seeds, so that someone deserving of the boons to be granted by the Fey could locate them, if resourceful enough. Unfortunately, If there ever were such seeds, they disapeared long ago.

Oh what a treasure you have found!  It is too bad the seeds are no longer fertile.  I dont know much about how to open the gate to the Enchanted Fey Kingdom, but I am sure it involves planting the seeds...
Ye Gods! Do you realise that adventurers from around the realms have beens searching for the Immortal Crown for AGES?!

You haven't actualy tried to use it have you? The item is cursed! If you place that crown upon your head, you will be possessed by an evil avatar, and most likely you will begin slaying everything within sight!

That crown must be destroyed at all costs! Firstly, it is extremely dangerous, as you may have noticed, and secondly, I believe that the person who destroys that crown may in fact be granted immortality!

Ahhh, errr, well, Im not really all that certain. I am led to believe by what little information I have gathered, that it must be destroyed in the Hell Forge, deep within the Abyss.  If that is the case, then we have a slight problem, because I know of no way to get there...

You found the crown in Manatakloss, correct? If anyone would have information about this, it would be the Drow. Bring me every book you can find that was written by Drow hands, or has anything to do with the crown, and I will see what I can come up with.
Excellent! Just give me some time to do some research, and Ill let you know what I find out.

Eh, sorry about that, to speed things up I stopped time for a bit there...   Ok, I found some secret pages hidden in one of the books.. the Queens diary...  It seems she was close to discovering the crowns secrets. I think i can send you and your friends to the Abyss.. but I must warn you, it is a one way trip. There is no returning from the Abyss. Perhaps he who destroys the crown may be able to escape, but i am reasonably sure that the mission is a suicide mission for all involved.

Unfortunately I am dead serious... in fact, I have reason to believe that destroying the crown will cause such a massive distortion in the fabric of the realms that many people accross the realms will die!  Still, th crown must be destroyed, in the hands of the wrong person even more people could die.
Are you sure?

I see you have accomplished your task. Much death and destruction was brought upon the realms when you destroyed the crown... but had the crown not been destroyed, death and destruction would have ruled these realms....   I congratulate you on your success.  Know this... although you cannot die, you can still be knocked unconscious. If this happens, Im sure you will regain your senses within a few minutes...
Does this note belong to you?
So it is your's?
Would you care to explain what this evil and shame that the note mentions is all about?
Were is this evil now?
Tell me were to find this tomb and how to get inside it.
I will gather my friends and finish what you started long ago.
Can you tell me about any unusual items I have?
Nevermind.
Whats this empty bottle for?
Is this forest garnet important?
What can I do with this forest garnet?
This forest garnet was under a rock in the forgotten forest.
I found a forest garnet in the forgotten forest.
the wizard north of town gave me this hero crystal.
I found this "House Fen'Lis's" in Manatakloss.
I found this "House Ghur'atsz Crest" in Manatakloss.
I found this "House Khur'aan Crest" in Manatakloss.
I found this "House De'Nat Crest" in Manatakloss.
I found this Human sacrifice in the underdark.
I have here a Jade tooth.
What is a Krenshar Noble Cats Eye?
Is this Mutant Fire Beetle belly of any use?
Is this nether bat eye of any use?
These faery seeds... can I do anything with them?
A crazy witch sold me this rainbow stone.. was it worth the price?
What does this seal breaker do?
What is this "Gem of Telepathy"?
I have Anduins Staff repaired!!!
Anduins ceremonial staff has broken, all I have left is this broken ceremonial staff!
This Gem of Teleportation looks unusual...
What in the world is a "Heart Stone"?
What is this "Gem of Planar Travel"?
The hermit in the Drow sewers made my faery seeds fertile again!
I have a bottle of blessed oil from Anduins temple.
Is this a fragment of Anduins staff?
I may have found a piece of Anduins staff.
Is this one of the fragments of Anduins staff?
I think this is the base of Anduins staff.
I think I have found the head of Anduins staff...
What is this shovel for?
What can I use this sturdy rope for?
What value is this soul stone?
What do you do here?
What do you know of the Crown of Ascension?
Is there any adventure to be had around Ascension?
Can you translate this book?
Thats outrageous! I'll never pay that!
If it makes me immortal its worth it!
Thank you.
What do you know about Faery seeds?
I have some here....
I have something to show you...
Well, I must say, it wasnt easy to find...
Thankfully I havent tried it yet...
Ya, I kinda found that out the hard way...
Well, Im definetely interested in Immortality.. so how do I go about destroying this accursed thing?
Well what am I to do then?
Ok, I'll make haste to do just that.
Here is everything I could find... I hope it helps, because it wasn't easy finding all of this stuff!
Ok, take your time....
Your kidding right?
Ok, let me gather my fellow adventurers so that we may complete this gruesome task.
Ok, I have all my friends together, and we are ready to go.
No.
Yes.
